title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 71.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 71.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this rule is to protect public health, safety and welfare by specifying requirements for vent-free gas space heating appliances offered for sale or sold in New York State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
71.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
